definition: afternoon tea (light afternoon meal, typically pastries with tea or coffee)
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
7th earthly branch: 11 a.m.-1 p.m., noon, 5th solar month (6th June-6th July), year of the Horse/ancient Chinese compass point: 180° (south)

sentences.english: Teatime has become part of our everyday culture.
sentences.chinese: 下午茶已经成了我们日常文化的一部分。

sentences.english: The auspicious also money to ChengWu and members have afternoon tea, please.
sentences.chinese: 其祥还钱给成武，又请团员吃下午茶。

sentences.english: We usually have tea at half-past four.
sentences.chinese: 我们一般在四点半喝下午茶。

sentences.english: Mum is making coffee for the tea.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈正在为下午茶煮咖啡。

sentences.english: Fox hunting is a tradition almost as British as afternoon tea.
sentences.chinese: 猎狐活动几乎和下午茶一样，是英国的一项传统。

sentences.english: Do you have afternoon tea in your restaurant?
Okay, We set the Christmas tree in order, then what about afternoon tea?
sentences.chinese: 好的，我们摆好圣诞树就喝下午茶吧。

sentences.english: The Langham, Yangtze Boutique, Shanghai unveil the Royal Afternoon Tea.
sentences.chinese: 上海朗廷扬子精品酒店推出了朗廷皇室下午茶套餐。

sentences.english: Between-meal snacks to "wake up" are the solution when a power nap would be better.
sentences.chinese: 要解决这种疲惫，小睡会比下午茶得到更好的效果。

sentences.english: For afternoon tea we pick the Hong Hock Eating House in Chinatown at random.
sentences.chinese: 对于下午茶，我们随机选了中国城的丰富餐室。

sentences.english: Great! How about having some tea with us? We can consult it over in the restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 好，不如一起喝下午茶吧？大家可以在餐厅讨论一下。

sentences.english: Medium length aftertaste, black coffee refill, make this afternoon tea rich.
sentences.chinese: 中等长度的余蕴，加了黑咖啡，令这下午茶更丰富了。

sentences.english: Soldiers of the English Gloucestershire Regiment battalion stop for afternoon tea.
sentences.chinese: 来自英国格洛斯特郡的士兵在战斗间隙中喝下午茶。

sentences.english: Teatime takes place between the hours of two and five.
sentences.chinese: 下午茶时间是午后两点到五点。

sentences.english: The British working population did not have afternoon tea.
sentences.chinese: 英国的工人在过去并不喝下午茶。

sentences.english: Today's afternoon tea is cake and coffee. Would you like to pre-order some?
sentences.chinese: 今天的下午茶是蛋糕加咖啡，你要预订吗？

definition: tea and cake/refreshments/tea and dimsun 點心|点心, traditional Hong Kong lunch
